{{cpp/chrono/month_weekday_last/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++20|1=
constexpr month_weekday_last( const std::chrono::month&amp; m,
                              const std::chrono::weekday_last&amp; wdl ) noexcept;
}}

Constructs a {{tt|month_weekday_last}} object that stores the {{ltt|cpp/chrono/month}} {{c|m}} and the {{ltt|cpp/chrono/weekday_last}} {{c|wdl}}.

===Notes===
A more convenient way to construct a {{tt|month_weekday_last}} is with {{c|operator/}}, e.g., {{c|std::chrono::April/std::chrono::Sunday[std::chrono::last]}}.
